TOKENS: w a n eː
NOTES: There is uncertainty about the segmentation of some numerals, particularly from a diachronic perspective, in particular numbers 'eight' and 'nine'. Wayuu5 only reconstructs for Proto-Lokono-Wayuunaiki the numbers from ‘one’ to ‘four’, so it does not offer information on ‘eight’ and ‘nine’.

TOKENS: w a n eː + ʃ i a
NOTES: For number one also a masculine and feminine form are attested (Wayuu2[26-27])

TOKENS: w a n eː + s i a
p i a m a
a p ɨ n ɨ i n
p i e n ʧ i
h a ʔ r a -/ɺ i
a i p i r u a
a k a r a i ʃ i
m e k iː + s a ɺ ɨ
NOTES: The segmentation of numbers 'eight' and 'nine' are unclear. In the available literature the possible morphemes that form them are not addressed. There exists the feminine morpheme -saɺɨ (used with verbs) with variant -sat (Wayuu1[170]) and both forms are documented with numbers 'eight' and 'nine' (Wayuu2[27]).

TOKENS: m e k i/iː + e ʔ e t a + s a ɺ ɨ
NOTES: I do not find the possible morpheme -saɺɨ in the word for 'nine' attested in the 19th-century (Wayuu4 [24]), this may indicate that it is a morpheme and that was added later.

p i a m a + ʃ i k iː
NOTES: ʃikiː is the possessed form of third person feminine of 'head' (Wayuu1[254])
